channel.title: Java!
channel.description:
Ok i want a java syntax that will allow a command to add 13000 items
yes seriously 13000 items in one command anyone have anything like this because i don't want to have to sit here and type out 0-13000 because that's just no fun :)

item.title: Java!
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:10, topic:542162”][quote author=Yourserver link=topic=661038.msg4419022#msg4419022 date=1397502707]

if (cmd[0].equals("getitem123")) { for(int i = 0; i < 13001; i++) { player.getBank().addItem(new Item(i, Integer.MAX_VALUE, true); } return true; }

You missed a bracket;)
and theres still one stupid error :’(

starting... src\com\rs\game\player\content\commands\Owner.java:186: error: no suitable metho d found for addItem(Item) player.getBank().addItem(new Item(i, Integer.MAX_VALUE, true)); ^ method Bank.addItem(int,int,int,boolean) is not applicable (actual and formal argument lists differ in length) method Bank.addItem(int,int,boolean) is not applicable (actual and formal argument lists differ in length) method Bank.addItem(Item,boolean) is not applicable (actual and formal argument lists differ in length) 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

My bad bro here.

i had already put it in
and the error still occurs

Read full topic

item.title: Java!
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:4, topic:542162”][quote author=Yourserver link=topic=661038.msg4419013#msg4419013 date=1397498591]

What do you mean 13000 items like an amount of an item or 13000 different ones.

you can always use a for loop

for(int i = 0; i < 13001; i++) { addItem(i, 1); }

13000 different items in a bank ?

At the minuite ive got this command but i need the loop part

if (cmd[0].equals("getitem123")) { int[] toAdd = { }; player.getBank().addItems(toAdd, Integer.MAX_VALUE); return true; }
[/quote]

                [code=java]if (cmd[0].equals("getitem123")) {
                        for(int i = 0; i < 13001; i++) {
                        player.getBank().addItems(i, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
                        }
                        return true;
                }[/code]

You may want to add a check for nulled items.[/quote]
yeah i will just need the command to work…

starting... src\com\rs\game\player\content\commands\Owner.java:187: error: method addItems i n class Bank cannot be applied to given types; player.getBank().addItems(i, Integer.MAX_VALUE); ^ required: Item[],boolean found: int,int reason: actual argument int cannot be converted to Item[] by method invocation conversion 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
any fix for this error?

Read full topic

item.title: Java!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“Yourserver, post:3, topic:542162”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=661038.msg4419012#msg4419012 date=1397498246]
What do you mean 13000 items like an amount of an item or 13000 different ones.

you can always use a for loop

for(int i = 0; i < 13001; i++) { addItem(i, 1); }
[/quote]
13000 different items in a bank ?

At the minuite ive got this command but i need the loop part

if (cmd[0].equals("getitem123")) { int[] toAdd = { }; player.getBank().addItems(toAdd, Integer.MAX_VALUE); return true; }[/quote]

                [code=java]if (cmd[0].equals("getitem123")) {
                        for(int i = 0; i < 13001; i++) {
                        player.getBank().addItems(i, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
                        }
                        return true;
                }[/code]

You may want to add a check for nulled items.

Read full topic
